404.message: The page you were looking for does not exist.
404.title: Page not found

demo.description: Browse our demo hub without registering and discover which products you can buy at Ne'Na'Na.

info.description: To make it easier and faster for you to reach your store, your chosen pick-up location will be saved and automatically selected the next time you visit this website.
info.title: Choose your preferred pick-up location

redirecting.description: You will be redirected to the new page in a few seconds. Click cancel or press Esc to choose another pick-up location
redirecting.title: Redirecting...

box.p1: In order to shop at this hub, Ne'Na'Na must register you as a customer. <2>Only customers who registered using this form can make purchases at Ne'Na'Na</2>. To do so, fill out the form below and submit it.
box.p2: Once you have been added as a customer, you will receive a welcome email from Ne'Na'Na. This email contains all the information you need to proceed, as well as information you will need for shopping (information about Open Food Network, access to the depot, order cycle procedures, etc.).
box.title: Registration instructions

description.email: The email address we should use to contact you
description.name: Your first and last name

label.communication: Would you like to subscribe to the Ne'Na'Na newsletter?
label.name: Name
label.termsAccepted: I accept the terms of use: By submitting this form, I agree that Ne'Na'Na may contact me to welcome me and provide me with information on how to proceed. I agree that Ne'Na'Na may send me weekly order reminders. I can unsubscribe from these at any time.

actions.continueLegend: For existing customer with an OFN account

registerStart.p1: Registration is required in order to shop at the Ne'Na'Na store. If you are already registered with Ne'Na'Na and have received instructions from our team (maybe you are using this app on a new device?), you can continue without another registration and wait. You will then be redirected to your selected store.
registerStart.title: Already registered with Ne'Na'Na?

box.p1: You have already registered with Ne'Na'Na. Please check your email for instructions on how to complete your registration. Please do not register again, instead, if you think something went wrong, contact the hub's manager.
box.title: Registration already sent

box.p1: Thank you for registering with Ne'Na'Na. Please check your email for further instructions. We will contact you within 1-2 business days.

home.description: Choose a store to be forwarded to the next time you visit this site
home.title: Ne'Na'Na

register.description: Register with Ne'Na'Na to access a store directly via this website.
register.title: Ne'Na'Na Registration

storeMap.noStores: No stores found to display on map

storeSelection.error: There was an error loading the store data
